feat.name: Bloodlust
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Powerful Recovery
entries: When you roll a {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB|Hit Point Die} to regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, you can treat any roll of 1 or 2 as a 3.

entries.name: Sanguine Feast
entries: Once per turn when you hit a {@status Bloodied|XPHB} creature that isn't a Construct or Undead with an attack roll, you can expend a {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB|Hit Point Die}, roll it, and regain a number of {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the number rolled plus your Constitution modifier.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Bomber
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Far Lobber
entries: When you use the {@action Attack|XPHB} action to throw a vial or flask, you can target an object or creature you can see within 40 feet of yourself.

entries.name: Long Shots
entries: Attacking at long range doesn't impose {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on your attack rolls with {@itemProperty T|XPHB|Thrown} weapons.

feat.name: Boon of Blazing Dawn
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Beloved of the Sun
entries: You have {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Radiant damage.

entries.name: Blazing Strike
entries: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, the damage can be Radiant or the weapon's normal damage type (your choice).

entries.name: Burst of Sunlight
entries: Once per turn when you hit a creature with an attack that deals Radiant damage, you can emit {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} in a 30-foot radius from yourself and {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} for an additional 30 feet until the start of your next turn. This light is sunlight.

feat.name: Boon of Looming Shadows
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Shadowy Stretch
entries: When you take the {@action Attack|XPHB} action, your reach for your Melee weapon attacks increases by 10 feet until the end of your turn.

entries.name: Dancing Silhouette
entries: You can take the {@action Dodge|XPHB} action as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}.

feat.name: Boon of Misty Escape
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Gaseous Form
entries: If you drop to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} but aren't killed outright, you can instead drop to 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} and cast {@spell Gaseous Form|XPHB} without expending a spell slot (no action required). When you cast this spell this way, you can target only yourself, your {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} is 20 feet, and you regain 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of each of your turns for the spell's duration. The spell's spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat.
Once you use this benefit, you can't do so again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Cloying Mists
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Arise, Fog
entries: You always have the {@spell Fog Cloud|XPHB} spell prepared. You can cast it without a spell slot, and you must finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB} before you can cast it in this way again. You can also cast it using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. Your spellcasting ability for the spell is the ability increased by this feat.

entries.name: Grasping Mist
entries: Whenever you cast {@spell Fog Cloud|XPHB}, nonmagical flames in the spell's {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} are extinguished, and creatures other than you and your allies have their {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} reduced by 5 feet while in the spell's {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere}.

feat.name: Delicious Pain
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Toughened Flesh
entries: Immediately after you take Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to gain {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage until the start of your next turn. Once you use this benefit, you can't use it again until you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Light Bringer
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Sacred Magic
entries: You learn the {@spell Light|XPHB} spell and can cast it without Material components. If you already know that cantrip, you learn a different Cleric cantrip of your choice. The spell's spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat.

entries.name: Solar Luminance
entries: When you cast {@spell Light|XPHB}, you can have the light from the spell be sunlight. Once you use this benefit, you can't use it again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

entries.name: Sun's Healing
entries: As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} while within sunlight, you can expend one of your {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB}, roll the die, and regain a number of {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the roll. Once you use this benefit, you can't use it again until you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Love Bites
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Endearing Pain
entries: Immediately after you damage a creature with a Melee weapon or an {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB}, you can take a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} to give the target the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition until the start of your next turn or until you or your allies damage it. Once you use this benefit, you can't use it again until you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Putrefy
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Necrosis
entries: When you make a damage roll that deals Necrotic damage, you can cause one creature taking that damage to have the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the start of your next turn. Once you use this benefit, you can't use it again until you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Rebuke
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Radiant Strike
entries: When you make a damage roll that deals Radiant damage, you can cause one Huge or smaller creature taking the damage to have the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. Once you use this benefit, you can't use it again until you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Tireless Reveler
entries: When an ally you can see within 60 feet of yourself expends {@variantrule Heroic Inspiration|XPHB}, you can gain {@variantrule Heroic Inspiration|XPHB} if you lack it. You can use this benefit a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Treacherous Allure
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Enchanting Presence
entries: You always have the {@spell Charm Person|XPHB} spell prepared. You can cast it without a spell slot, and you must finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB} before you can cast it in this way again. You can also cast it using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. Your spellcasting ability for the spell is the ability increased by this feat.

entries.name: Inevitable Betrayal
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against creatures with the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition.

feat.name: Vampire Hunter
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Adroit Escape
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on checks to escape from nonmagical restraints or the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition.

entries.name: Vitality Ward
entries: When you take Necrotic damage, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to mitigate the damage. Roll a number of d6s equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and add them together. Reduce the Necrotic damage you take by this total. Once you use this benefit, you can't use it again until you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Vampire Touched
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Vampire Magic
entries: Choose one level 1 spell from the Enchantment or Illusion school of magic. You always have that spell and the {@spell Spider Climb|XPHB} spell prepared. You can cast each of these spells without expending a spell slot, but when you cast {@spell Spider Climb|XPHB} this way, you must target yourself, and you must finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB} before you can cast each spell in this way again. You can also cast either spell using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. Your spellcasting ability for the spells is the ability increased by this feat.

feat.name: Vampire's Plaything
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Decanting
entries: When you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, you can create one {@item Potion of Healing|XDMG} or an {@item Antitoxin|XPHB}, as long as you have an empty {@item vial|XPHB} or {@item flask|XPHB}. These liquids evaporate when you finish another {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

entries.name: Timely Retreat
entries: You can take a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} to take the {@action Dash|XPHB} action or the {@action Disengage|XPHB} action. You can use this benefit a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you recover all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

entries.name: Vampiric Connection
entries: The DM determines the fate of your former vampire master. While you and your former vampire master are on the same plane of existence, the vampire can communicate with you telepathically, and you can choose to allow the vampire to perceive through your senses.
